titleStmt.title: Iter Lusitanicum, or, The Portugal voyage with what memorable passages interven'd at the shipping, and in the transportation of her Most Sacred Majesty Katherine, Queen of Great Britain, from Lisbon, to England, exactly observed by him that was eye-witnesse of the same, who though he publish this, conceals his name / by S.H. ...
titleStmt.author: Hinde, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Griffin, for Robert Paulett ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
